info.title: Identity Management
info.description: Identity management apis for account inquiry

post.description: This endpoint verifies the credentials of a user by sending their username and password to the Identity Management API and provide access token to access inquiry endpoints.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Transaction ID provided by the user.

password.description: The password associated with the username.

parameters.name: Api-key
parameters.description: API key for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

access_token.description: The access token for further authentication.

expiry_in.description: The duration in seconds for which the token is valid.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid API key or credentials

post.description: This endpoint verifies the status of an MSISDN (phone number) by sending a merchant transaction ID and MSISDN to the API.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

is_msisdn_active.description: Indicates whether the MSISDN is active.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies whether the subscriber type for a given MSISDN is prepaid or post-paid.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

subscriber_type.description:
- True indicates the subscriber type is Prepaid.
- False indicates the subscriber type is Post-paid.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies the tenure (duration of service) for a given MSISDN.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

tenureRange.description:
- 1: Less than 1 month (<= 30 days)
- 2: 1 – 3 months (30 days < M <= 90 days)
- 3: 3 – 6 months (90 days < M <= 180 days)
- 4: 6 – 12 months (180 days < M <= 365 days)
- 5: More than 12 months (> 365 days)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies the validation of an MSISDN by sending a merchant transaction ID and MSISDN to the API.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

is_msisdn_valid.description: Indicates whether the MSISDN is valid.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies if the IMSI of a device has changed over a specified period, based on the MSISDN provided.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

msisdn.description: The MSISDN (phone number) for which IMSI changes are being checked.

period.description:
- 1 indicates validation of IMSI changes in the last 1 day
- 7 indicates validation of IMSI changes in the last 7 days
- 30 indicates validation of IMSI changes in the last 30 days
- 60 indicates validation of IMSI changes in the last 60 days
- 90 indicates validation of IMSI changes in the last 90 days

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

flag_1m_simswap.description:
- True indicates IMSI changes detected within 30 days.
- False indicates IMSI changes not detected within 30 days.

flag_3m_simswap.description:
- True indicates IMSI changes detected within 90 days.
- False indicates IMSI changes not detected within 90 days.

flag_2m_simswap.description:
- True indicates IMSI changes detected within 60 days.
- False indicates IMSI changes not detected within 60 days.

flag_1w_simswap.description:
- True indicates IMSI changes detected within 7 days.
- False indicates IMSI changes not detected within 7 days.

flag_1d_simswap.description:
- True indicates IMSI changes detected within 1 day.
- False indicates IMSI changes not detected within 1 day.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies whether the IMEI associated with a given MSISDN has changed within a specified period.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

msisdn.description: The MSISDN (phone number) to verify for IMEI changes.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

flag_1d_imei_changes.description:
- True indicates IMEI changes detected within the last 1 day.
- False indicates no IMEI changes detected within the last 1 day.

flag_1w_imei_changes.description:
- True indicates IMEI changes detected within the last 7 days.
- False indicates no IMEI changes detected within the last 7 days.

flag_1m_imei_changes.description:
- True indicates IMEI changes detected within the last 30 days.
- False indicates no IMEI changes detected within the last 30 days.

flag_2m_imei_changes.description:
- True indicates IMEI changes detected within the last 60 days.
- False indicates no IMEI changes detected within the last 60 days.

flag_3m_imei_changes.description:
- True indicates IMEI changes detected within the last 90 days.
- False indicates no IMEI changes detected within the last 90 days.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies if the provided NIK (National Identification Number) is valid and matches with the MSISDN.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

nik.description: The NIK (National Identification Number) to verify.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

is_nik_valid.description:
- True indicates that the NIK is valid and matches with the MSISDN.
- False indicates that the NIK is invalid or does not match with the MSISDN.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies whether the NIK (National Identification Number) associated with the MSISDN has changed within a specified period.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

msisdn.description: The MSISDN (phone number) to verify for NIK changes.

period.description: The period in days within which NIK changes are being checked (1, 7, 30, 60, 90 days).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

flag_1d_nik.description:
- True indicates NIK changes detected in the last 1 day.
- False indicates NIK changes not detected in the last 1 day.

flag_1w_nik.description:
- True indicates NIK changes detected in the last 7 days.
- False indicates NIK changes not detected in the last 7 days.

flag_1m_nik.description:
- True indicates NIK changes detected in the last 30 days.
- False indicates NIK changes not detected in the last 30 days.

flag_2m_nik.description:
- True indicates NIK changes detected in the last 60 days.
- False indicates NIK changes not detected in the last 60 days.

flag_3m_nik.description:
- True indicates NIK changes detected in the last 90 days.
- False indicates NIK changes not detected in the last 90 days.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies if a MSISDN (phone number) has been recycled within a specified period.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

period.description: The period in days to check for the recycling flag (1, 7, 30, 60, 90 days).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

flag_1d_recycle.description:
- True indicates a recycle number flag detected within the last 1 day.
- False indicates no recycle number flag detected within the last 1 day.

flag_1w_recycle.description:
- True indicates a recycle number flag detected within the last 7 days.
- False indicates no recycle number flag detected within the last 7 days.

flag_1m_recycle.description:
- True indicates a recycle number flag detected within the last 30 days.
- False indicates no recycle number flag detected within the last 30 days.

flag_2m_recycle.description:
- True indicates a recycle number flag detected within the last 60 days.
- False indicates no recycle number flag detected within the last 60 days.

flag_3m_recycle.description:
- True indicates a recycle number flag detected within the last 90 days.
- False indicates no recycle number flag detected within the last 90 days.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization

post.description: This endpoint verifies the proximity of the inactive date for a given MSISDN.

merchant_transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the verification request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID associated with this verification.

status_message.description: The status message of the operation.

inactive_date.description:
The proximity of the inactive date, with each value representing a day range:
- 1: Less than 1 day (< 1 day)
- 2: 1 - 3 days (>= 1 day and < 3 days)
- 3: 3 - 7 days (>= 3 days and < 7 days)
- 4: 7 - 30 days (>= 7 days and < 30 days)
- 5: More than 30 days (> 30 days)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid token or missing authorization
